Index >  CapValueString

CapValueString

Description

Returns or sets the string value of a capability specified by Capability.

Data type

<string>

Syntax

.CapValueString = ...;

Remarks

To check a capability, read this property after calling CapGet() method.
When setting a capability, set this property before calling CapSet() to actually set the value.

Valid only when the capability has the CapType of TWON_ONEVALUE (5).

Use this property to get/set a capability that has a value type of <string>, otherwise, use CapValue instead.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode orErrorStringfor error information.

See also

How to Negotiate Capability with Different Capability Container Types

CapGet()
CapReset()
CapSet()
